text: He muminagana, tomadera madhye ye sbiya dharma theke phire yabe, acire allaha emana sampradaya srsti karabena, yaderake tini bhalabasabena ebam tara tamke bhalabasabe. Tara musalamanadera prati binaya-namra habe ebam kapheradera prati kathora habe. Tara allahara pathe jehada karabe ebam kona tiraskarakarira tiraskare bhita habe na. Eti allahara anugraha-tini yake iccha dana karena. Allaha pracurya danakari, mahajnani.
